name: Red Meat Lovers - Porterhouse Prensado
additionalNotes: Red Meat Lovers is a premium cigar designed to be enjoyed after a hearty meal of meat. This exclusive blend combines whiskey and espresso flavors for a sophisticated experience. Initially created for the Red Meat Lovers Club, it has become a hit in individual stores. Available in three classic formats and a spicier variation, it is perfect to combine with copious meals or for those looking for a pure mature and dark.
